text: The 2021 season was the Seattle Seahawks' 46th season in the National Football League and their 12th under head coach Pete Carroll. ==Draft== 2021 Seattle Seahawks Draft Round Selection Player Position College Notes 2 56 D'Wayne Eskridge WR Western Michigan 4 137 Tre Brown CB Oklahoma From Tampa Bay 6 208 Stone Forsythe OT Florida ==Regular season== ===Schedule=== The Seahawks' regular season schedule was announced on May 12.
